strings.str: X days since Jaime @HerreraBeutler had an in-person town hall. #FlipThe3rd
X days since your last in-person town hall. Why won’t you come talk with us, Jaime @HerreraBeutler? #FlipThe3rd
Have you seen Jaime @HerreraBeutler?! She hasn’t hosted an in-person town hall for X days now! #FlipThe3rd
Jaime @HerreraBeutler, don’t you think it’s time to come talk to us in person? It’s been X days! #FlipThe3rd
X days and counting since your last in-perosn town hall. We’re waiting, Jaime @HerreraBeutler. #FlipThe3rd
Jaime @HerreraBeutler cares more about Trump’s opinion than ours. X days since her last in-person town hall. #FlipThe3rd
Jaime @HerreraBeutler, were you elected to represent us, or ignore us? X days since your last in-person town hall. #FlipThe3rd
Jaime @HerreraBeutler, are you scared of us? X days since your last in-person town hall! #FlipThe3rd
X days. Let that sink in. X days of hiding from her constituents. @HerreraBeutler #FlipThe3rd
.@AOC could you talk to Jaime @HerreraBeutler for us? We haven’t had an in-person town hall with her in X days. #FlipThe3rd
We miss you, Jaime @HerreraBeutler. Come talk to us in person. It’s been X days. #FlipThe3rd
Pay attention to your constituents, Jaime @HerreraBeutler! We haven’t seen you in X days! #FlipThe3rd
Jaime @HerreraBeutler is MIA. WA-3 hasn’t seen her face in X days! #FlipThe3rd
I bet @ElectLong wouldn’t go X days without facing her constituents, Jaime @HerreraBeutler #FlipThe3rd
X days since you’ve shown your face to the public in District 3, Jaime @HerreraBeutler. You proud of that, coward? #FlipThe3rd
X days, Jaime @HerreraBeutler. X Days. X DAYS! Can’t hack it when the questions aren’t screened by your staffers? #FlipThe3rd
Spread the word. Jaime @HerreraBeutler is afraid of her constituents. She hasn’t faced us in X days. #FlipThe3rd
I’m no PoliSci major, but X days without speaking with your constituents seems like a lot. Comment @HerreraBeutler? #FlipThe3rd
Imgn going X days w/out tlkng to your boss. That’s what @HerreraBeutler is doing. Come home for a performance review. #FlipThe3rd
Only a coward would go X days without facing their constituents Jaime @HerreraBeutler. #FlipThe3rd
Friends don’t let friends vote Republican. Step aside, Jaime @HerreraBeutler. @ElectLong wouldn’t ignore us for X days. #FlipThe3rd
If I didn’t show up for work for X days, I’d be fired. What makes you so special, Jaime @HerreraBeutler? #FlipThe3rd
Fewer photo ops, more town halls, Jaime @HerreraBeutler! It’s been X days! #FlipThe3rd
I spent more time writing this bot than Jaime @HerreraBeutler has spent in in-person town halls for the last X days! #FlipThe3rd
We’d like a word with you, Jaime @HerreraBeutler. I guess you wouldn’t know that since we haven’t seen you in X days. #FlipThe3rd
X: The number of days since Jaime @HerreraBeutler had an in person town hall. Shameful. #FlipThe3rd
They could make your story a documentary, Jaime @HerreraBeutler. Avoiding constituents for X days is impressive. #FlipThe3rd
What do you spend your time doing if not talking with your constituents Jaime @HerreraBeutler? X days! #FlipThe3rd
Jaime @HerreraBeutler, avoiding your constituents is undemocratic. X days since your last in-person own hall. #FlipThe3rd
Can’t know what we want if you don’t come talk to us Jaime @HerreraBeutler. X days and counting. Tick Tock! #FlipThe3rd
Even @Comcast is more attuned to my needs than you are, Jaime @HerreraBeutler. You’re such a joke. X days! #FlipThe3rd
Another day in WA-3 without a glimpse of Jaime @HerreraBeutler. That makes X days without a town hall. #FlipThe3rd
Knock Knock. Who's there? Not Jaime @HerreraBeutler. For X days now. #FlipThe3rd

@HerreraBeutler Interesting Jaime. Let's talk about it in person. It's been X days since your last town hall! #FlipThe3rd
@HerreraBeutler Fewer photo ops, more talking with your constituents. It's been X days! #FlipThe3rd
@HerreraBeutler How does this help us, Jaime? Maybe come explain in person. X days since your last! #FlipThe3rd
@HerreraBeutler Great picture. It'd look better with a town hall crowd. X days since your last! #FlipThe3rd
@HerreraBeutler Neat, but how can you represent us if you don't talk to us. X days since your last town hall! #FlipThe3rd
@HerreraBeutler I'm a bot, so I can't tell, but is this about fish? X days since your last in-person town hall. #FlipThe3rd
@HerreraBeutler COME. TALK. TO. US! You've avoided it for X days now. Don't you think it's time? #FlipThe3rd
@HerreraBeutler Okay. You know the drill. X days. Sure would be nice to talk to my rep. #FlipThe3rd
